title: EPIC E1: Evaluation Foundation
acceptance_criteria: Baseline dataset lock file exists and is versioned | Per-commit and nightly metric jobs are defined | Baseline outputs are published as artifacts for comparison
description: Weeks 1-3. Establish deterministic datasets, baseline metrics, CI smoke checks, and dashboards used as hard release gates.

title: EPIC E2: Receipts + Proposal Workflow
acceptance_criteria: Proposal-only workflow exists for rename/type/comment mutations | Every auto-applied change includes a receipt | Rollback can restore previous state reliably
description: Weeks 2-6. Build receipt-first proposal flow with review/apply/rollback as the default mutation path.

title: EPIC E3: Capability Guard + Policy Modes
acceptance_criteria: All tool invocations are capability-checked | Policy mode enforcement is test-covered | Security regressions block release
description: Weeks 2-7. Enforce capability-scoped execution and policy modes (offline, allowlist, cloud) with auditability.

title: EPIC E4: Local Semantic Search
acceptance_criteria: Local index builds from analyzed artifacts | Semantic search UI is usable in-plugin | Recall/latency gates are enforced
description: Weeks 4-8. Deliver local indexing, similarity retrieval, and intent-level search with measurable quality/latency gains.

title: EPIC E5: Triage Crew v1
acceptance_criteria: Triage mission graph is deterministic | Mission output is artifactized and reviewable | Hotspot recall target is measured
description: Weeks 7-10. Ship deterministic triage mission that outputs map, hotspots, unknowns, and evidence references.

title: EPIC E6: Type PR Lifecycle v1
acceptance_criteria: Type assertions persist with lifecycle metadata | Review UI supports approve/reject/change requests | Propagation and conflict handling are implemented
description: Weeks 8-11. Add type assertions lifecycle (proposed->reviewed->accepted->propagated) and reviewer workflows.

title: EPIC E7: Corpus Sync Pilot
acceptance_criteria: Approved-only sync path exists | Provenance chain survives sync | Cross-binary reuse can be pulled back into local analysis
description: Weeks 10-12. Sync approved artifacts to shared corpus with provenance and access-control enforcement.

title: EPIC E8: Hardening + Release Candidate
acceptance_criteria: Full regression suite passes | Security signoff completed | Exit-gate report and go/no-go decision recorded
description: Weeks 11-12. Run full regression/soak, complete security signoff, and produce release candidate decision package.

title: E1-S1: Pin datasets and stand up deterministic evaluation harness
acceptance_criteria: A locked dataset manifest exists with reproducible versions/checksums | Evaluation entrypoints run in a clean environment without manual steps | Seed and environment controls are documented and enforced
description: Type: Story. Epic: E1. Build dataset lock and baseline harness plumbing for similarity/type/diff metrics.

title: E1-S2: Add per-commit smoke metrics and nightly regression pipeline
acceptance_criteria: Per-commit smoke job publishes metric artifacts | Nightly regression run compares against previous baseline | Failures are surfaced as blocking signals
description: Type: Story. Epic: E1. Wire CI jobs for smoke metrics and nightly full regression comparisons.

title: E1-S3: Run and publish stock baselines for semantic search and type recovery
acceptance_criteria: Baseline run covers selected benchmark slices | Results are versioned and traceable to code/dataset revisions | Baseline summary is accessible to all lanes
description: Type: Story. Epic: E1. Measure stock Ghidra baseline metrics and publish artifacts as comparator.

title: E1-S4: Build metrics dashboard and alert thresholds for MVP gates
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows current and trending values for all MVP exit gates | Threshold breaches trigger actionable alerts | Dashboard data is reproducible from saved artifacts
description: Type: Story. Epic: E1. Provide dashboard and alerting for recall/latency/receipt/rollback gates.

title: E2-S1: Implement receipt schema and append-only receipt store
acceptance_criteria: Receipt schema supports actor/action/target/evidence linkage | Append-only writes are enforced for receipt history | Receipt integrity verification detects tampering
description: Type: Story. Epic: E2. Introduce core receipt persistence model and hash-chain integrity semantics.

title: E2-S2: Build proposal state machine and review/apply API
acceptance_criteria: Proposal lifecycle states are persisted and queryable | Approve/reject/bulk actions are supported | Only approved proposals can enter apply workflow
description: Type: Story. Epic: E2. Add proposed->approved/rejected transitions with reviewer actions.

title: E2-S3: Implement transaction-safe apply and rollback adapter
acceptance_criteria: Apply operation records transaction + receipt linkage | Rollback restores pre-apply state for batch and single changes | Automated rollback tests pass for representative scenarios
description: Type: Story. Epic: E2. Wire approved proposals to transactional apply/undo semantics.

title: E2-S4: Capture and render evidence links for every proposal
acceptance_criteria: Evidence references are stored with stable identifiers | Review UI can inspect evidence per proposal | Evidence remains intact after apply and rollback
description: Type: Story. Epic: E2. Persist xrefs/constants/callsites evidence and display in review UI.

title: E3-S1: Enforce capability-token guard on all agent/tool operations
acceptance_criteria: Every tool entrypoint validates capability token before action | Denied operations fail closed with explicit reason | Capability checks are covered by unit tests
description: Type: Story. Epic: E3. Implement capability checks for read/write/execute surfaces.

title: E3-S2: Implement policy modes and endpoint allowlist enforcement
acceptance_criteria: Policy modes are configurable per project | Allowlist mode blocks non-approved destinations | Policy violations trigger deterministic mitigation behavior
description: Type: Story. Epic: E3. Add offline/allowlist/cloud modes and enforce outbound policy.

title: E3-S3: Add permission audit logs and violation incident records
acceptance_criteria: Security-relevant actions are logged with actor/time/target | Violation records include policy context and remediation action | Audit logs are queryable for compliance review
description: Type: Story. Epic: E3. Build auditable security event trails for agent/runtime actions.

title: E3-S4: Build security regression suite for no-direct-agent-write invariant
acceptance_criteria: Regression suite covers direct and indirect write paths | Failing security tests block merges | Invariant reports are attached to CI artifacts
description: Type: Story. Epic: E3. Add tests that prove agent cannot mutate canonical state directly.

title: E4-S1: Implement local embedding pipeline and similarity adapter baseline
acceptance_criteria: Pipeline creates searchable vectors/features for target corpus slice | Baseline retrieval API returns deterministic top-k results | Pipeline runtime and index build stats are recorded
description: Type: Story. Epic: E4. Build local indexing/embedding ingestion path and baseline retrieval adapter.

title: E4-S2: Deliver semantic search query service and in-tool search panel
acceptance_criteria: Search service supports intent query and similar-function query | UI displays ranked results with provenance/evidence references | Search interactions are instrumented for latency metrics
description: Type: Story. Epic: E4. Expose intent/similarity queries to analysts through plugin UI.

title: E4-S3: Add evidence-weighted reranking for semantic results
acceptance_criteria: Reranker consumes evidence-derived features | Result ordering improves against baseline on eval slice | Fallback path exists if reranker is unavailable
description: Type: Story. Epic: E4. Improve ranking quality using receipts/evidence-derived signals.

title: E4-S4: Meet semantic search recall/latency gates at MVP scale
acceptance_criteria: p95 search latency meets defined gate on target corpus size | Recall@10 improves by target delta versus stock baseline | Benchmark report is reproducible from CI artifacts
description: Type: Story. Epic: E4. Tune indexing/query path to hit p95 latency and recall targets.

title: E5-S1: Implement deterministic triage mission graph and feature extractor
acceptance_criteria: Triage mission runs through deterministic stage graph | Mission emits entrypoints/hotspots/unknowns with evidence refs | Mission execution summary is persisted as artifact
description: Type: Story. Epic: E5. Build triage crew mission pipeline with fixed stages and evidence hooks.

title: E5-S2: Add triage mission UI and exportable report artifacts
acceptance_criteria: Analyst can inspect triage map and ranked hotspots in UI | Mission outputs export to versionable artifact format | Evidence links are navigable from report to source context
description: Type: Story. Epic: E5. Render mission outputs in-plugin and export machine-readable summaries.

title: E5-S3: Calibrate triage scoring against curated benchmark set
acceptance_criteria: Curated triage benchmark set is versioned | Scoring calibration improves key metrics to target threshold | Calibration changes are documented with before/after results
description: Type: Story. Epic: E5. Measure and tune triage precision/recall against curated labeled corpus.

title: E6-S1: Persist type assertions with lifecycle metadata
acceptance_criteria: Type assertions persist target, source, confidence, and state | Lifecycle transitions are validated server-side | Type assertions link to receipt and evidence records
description: Type: Story. Epic: E6. Implement storage model for type assertions and lifecycle states.

title: E6-S2: Build Type PR review panel and workflow actions
acceptance_criteria: Type PR list/detail views are available in plugin UI | Review actions update lifecycle state atomically | Reviewer comments and rationale are persisted
description: Type: Story. Epic: E6. Add reviewer UI for type proposal packs with approve/reject/change requests.

title: E6-S3: Implement type propagation and conflict-resolution mechanics
acceptance_criteria: Accepted types propagate according to configured scope rules | Conflicts surface with deterministic resolution workflow | Propagation can be rolled back cleanly
description: Type: Story. Epic: E6. Propagate accepted types and handle competing assertions safely.

title: E6-S4: Add type suggestion generator with confidence thresholds
acceptance_criteria: Suggestions include confidence and evidence summary | Low-confidence suggestions are quarantined by policy | Suggestion quality metrics are collected in CI
description: Type: Story. Epic: E6. Generate type suggestions with confidence scoring and threshold policy.

title: E7-S1: Build approved-only corpus sync worker
acceptance_criteria: Sync worker filters out non-approved proposals | Sync jobs are idempotent and resumable | Sync telemetry includes counts/errors/latency
description: Type: Story. Epic: E7. Sync only approved artifacts from local store to shared corpus backend.

title: E7-S2: Enforce provenance and access controls on corpus sync/read paths
acceptance_criteria: Synced artifacts retain complete provenance chain | Access control checks are enforced on sync and retrieval | Unauthorized requests are denied and audited
description: Type: Story. Epic: E7. Require provenance continuity and policy checks for shared corpus operations.

title: E7-S3: Implement cross-binary reuse and pullback into local analysis session
acceptance_criteria: Cross-binary match retrieval works from local session | Reused artifacts are inserted as proposals with receipts | Analyst can accept/reject pulled suggestions in normal review flow
description: Type: Story. Epic: E7. Query corpus for reusable names/types/annotations and apply as proposals locally.

title: E8-S1: Run full regression and soak test, fix release-blocking bottlenecks
acceptance_criteria: Regression suite runs to completion on release candidate | All blocking failures have fixes or explicit waivers | Soak test report includes performance and stability trends
description: Type: Story. Epic: E8. Execute full test matrix and harden bottlenecks before RC.

title: E8-S2: Execute adversarial abuse scenarios and complete security signoff
acceptance_criteria: Abuse scenario suite executes with documented outcomes | Critical findings are remediated or formally accepted | Security signoff checklist is completed and versioned
description: Type: Story. Epic: E8. Validate runtime against abuse/prompt-injection/policy-bypass scenarios.

title: E8-S3: Package release candidate and publish operator/reviewer runbook
acceptance_criteria: Release candidate is packaged with versioned changelog | Runbook covers setup, review flow, rollback, and incident handling | Known limitations are explicitly documented
description: Type: Story. Epic: E8. Produce installable RC and operational docs for analysts/reviewers/operators.

title: E8-S4: Produce MVP exit-gate report and final go/no-go decision artifact
acceptance_criteria: Exit-gate report includes all required metrics and pass/fail status | Risk register and unresolved items are explicitly listed | Go/no-go decision is documented with rationale and approvers
description: Type: Story. Epic: E8. Consolidate gate outcomes and record formal release decision.
